mapper.insert: insert into cart2(memberId, productNum, productAmount) values(#{memberId}, #{productNum}, #{productAmount})
mapper.update: update cart2 set productAmount=#{productAmount} where cartNum = #{cartNum}
mapper.select: select a.cartNum, a.memberId, a.productNum, a.productAmount, p.productName, p.productPrice from cart2 a left outer join product p on a.productNum = p.productNum where a.memberId = p.memberId
select * from cart2 where memberId = #{memberId} and productNum = #{productNum}
mapper.delete: delete from cart2 where memberId = #{memberId} and productNum = #{productNum}
